control.name: cheAutoHeight
control.description: Enables or disables the auto height feature for the current View.

control.name: cheMemo
control.description: Specifies the auto height feature availability for RepositoryItemMemoEdit items. Depending on the LinesCount property these items can either occupy as much space as it's needed to display their entire content, or display only a certain number of lines.

control.name: chePicture
control.description: Sets the inplace RepositoryItemPictureEdit editors' height either to 40 or 0 pixels. If the CustomHeight property equals 0, the height of the picture editor is adjusted to the height of the displayed image. Setting the TopRowIndex property to 0 scrolls the View to the first row.

control.name: sbSwitching
control.description: Switches the View from CardView to GridView and vice versa.
